metadata.title: CVE-2022-35016 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 1.20-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20-1ubuntu0.2+esm2').
